text: In this video,
we will show you how to remove an account
from the Instagram app.
Keep in mind that removing an account

is different from
permanently deleting one.

If you need help deleting
your Instagram account,

check out our video linked
in the description below.
Tap your profile picture here.

Then tap the down arrow next
to your Instagram username.
Choose the account you want to remove
from the drop-down menu.

Tap the three-lines icon
in the top right corner.
Then tap "Settings."

Tap the blue "Log Out" text
at the bottom of the screen.
In the pop-up window,

you can log out of multiple
accounts at the same time

by tapping the circle to the
right of the account name.

A blue check mark should
appear in the circle
if you've selected the account.
Make sure to select the correct account,
then tap "Log Out" to remove it.
Tap "Log Out" again to confirm.
Now the account will no longer show up
along your other Instagram accounts.
